snippet: Faculty members at Penn State University are objecting to an employee wellness plan that asks them to disclose medical and other personal information.
abstract: Natasha Singer Technophoria column; faculty members at Penn State University are objecting to an employee wellness plan that asks them to disclose medical and other personal information; wellness trend is likely to grow under Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Faculty members at Penn State University are objecting to an employee wellness plan that asks them to disclose medical and other personal information.

headline.main: On Campus, a Faculty Uprising Over Personal Data
headline.print_headline: On Campus, Unrest Over Personal Data

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
